input_string: she dreaded [MASK] day when mason was old enough to ask about his father .
she never wanted anything in the world to hurt him , and she knew that being rejected by [MASK] father would .
with a sigh , she stepped into the dress and slid it over her hips [MASK]
wrestling around to get the zipper all the way up caused her to [MASK] and puff .
standing back [MASK] the mirror , she turned to and fro to take in her appearance .
[MASK] 'd always loved how the dress made her feel sexy , but at the same time was very respectable .
[MASK] it boasted a sweetheart neckline , the hemline fell just below her knees .
she put on her pearls-a high school graduation [MASK] from her uncle aidan , or `` ankle '' , as she often called him .
aidan was her mother 's [MASK] brother and only son of the family .
when she was born , he was only eight [MASK] a half .
